column3: French recognition of Algerian referendum on independence held two days earlier
Britain ends its protectorate, granting independence to Egypt
Independence from UN Trusteeship (British and French administration after Italian governance ends in 1947)
The Malagasy Republic was created as autonomous state within French Community

column2: Return of Spanish Morocco to Morocco

column3: Union of Trust Territory of Somalia (former Italian Somaliland) and State of Somaliland (formerly British Somaliland)
Statute of Westminster, which establishes a status of legislative equality between the self-governing dominion of the Union of South Africaand the UK

column2: Creation of the autonomous Union of South Africa from the previously separate colonies of the Cape, Natal, Transvaal and Orange River

column3: Separation of Southern Sudan from Sudan
Independence from Egyptian and British joint rule
Independence of Tanganyika from the United Kingdom
Unilateral declaration of independence by Southern Rhodesia
May Revolution installs first local government
Bolivian War of Independence from Spain.
Independence from the United Kingdom of Portugal, Brazil and the Algarves declared
Costa Rica declared independence from Spain
Several wars were declared against Spain from 1868 to 1898, ending with the military support of USA to the Cuban Revolution.
Became an associated state of the United Kingdom
The Dominican Republic gains independence from Haiti
Independence from Spain of Gran Colombia, of which Ecuador is a part
El Salvador becomes province in First Mexican Empire, which declared independence from Spain
Associated state of the United Kingdom
Guatemala becomes state in Federal Republic of Central America, which declared independence from Spain
The French colony Saint-Domingue gains independence as Haiti
Honduras becomes state in Federal Republic of Central America, which declared independence from Spain
Nicaragua becomes state in Federal Republic of Central America, which declared independence from Spain
Associated state of the United Kingdom

column2: The United States cedes Serrana Bank and Roncador Bank to the Republic of Colombia as a result of a treaty signed in 1972

column3: Independence from Empire of Brazil declared, joined in union with United Provinces of the River Plate (current Argentina).
Treaty of Rawalpindi ends British control of foreign policy
End of treaties with the United Kingdom
Ugyen Wangchuck ends period of civil war and unites Bhutan
Brunei regains its independence after an agreement with the British on 4 January 1979
Independence from the British Mandate of Palestine
Victory of Emperor Jimmu, and the capital established in Yamato.
End of the British Mandate for Palestine
Declaration of creation of North Korea
Malayan Independence[14] from the United Kingdom was declared in Dataran Merdeka (Independence Square)
Myanmar (Burma) declares independence from the British Empire
Independence from British India in the Partition
The evolving revolutionary movement in the Philippines declaresitself independent from the Spanish Empire.[19][20][21]
Establishment of the First Saudi State [24]
End of the United Arab Republic
Republic of China government moved to Taiwan after the Chinese Civil War[27]
Salvage independence by Great king Taksin consist of Expulsion of Burmese and Establish a new kingdom together with reunification of Thailand
East Timor declares its independence but was suppressed by the Indonesian invasion
End of treaty relationship with the United Kingdom
Independence from the Soviet Union declared[11]
withdrawal of the Japanese after WWII
Unification of North Yemen and South Yemen
Principality of Arbër was established by archon Progon.
Reversal of annexation of Andorra by the Napoleonic Empire, through the Peninsular War
Austrian Independence Treaty re-established Austria as a sovereign state
Declaration of State Sovereignty of the Belarusian Soviet Socialist Republic
Independence was proclaimed by the provisonial government
Formation of the Banate of Bosnia

The Jelling stones, a pair of rune stones considered to be the "birth certificate" of Denmark reads: "King Haraldr ordered this monument made ... who won for himself all of Denmark and Norway and made the Danes Christian."
Independence declared from the Russian Empire

column2: De facto: Eastern coast of Narva riverand most of Petseri County were transferred to Russian SFSR

column3: First creation with (Clovis), king of the Franks
Creation of the Kingdom of France (West Francia), Treaty of Verdun
East Francia becomes the Holy Roman Empire (with the Kingdom of Germany as a main part of the empire)
Greek Revolution starts, various regional administrations established during 1821
Iceland becomes sovereign and independent from Denmark as the Kingdom of Iceland but retains a personal union with the King of Denmark.

column2: Kingdom of Iceland becomes a Republic.

column3: Foundation of the Kingdom of Ireland

column2: De facto: Northern Ireland secedes from the Irish Free State and rejoins the United Kingdom in accordance with the Irish Free State Constitution Act 1922

Republic of Ireland Act 1948 terminates the functions of the British King in Ireland’s diplomatic relations; domestic United Kingdom law purports that Ireland was one of the King’s dominions until this date; Irish law does not accept this interpretation.
The Peace treaty with Italy officially determines the boundaries of the Republic of Italy. The Italian Constitution of 1948 implements it at articles 10 and 117.

column3: Dissolution of the Confederation of the Rhine
Coronation of King Mindaugas (state established some time earlier, perhaps in the 1230s)
End of German occupation during World War II
Franco-Monegasque Treaty confirms Monaco's sovereignty (formerly a protectorate of the Kingdom of Sardinia)
Formation of Kingdom of Duklja/Zeta by King Mihajlo I
Plakkaat van Verlatinghe signed, independence from Spain

column2: Surrender of Nazi forces occupying the Netherlands

column3: After a referendum, the Socialist Republic of Macedonia declared independence from Yugoslavia[29]
King Harald I of Norway unifies the Petty kingdoms of Norway.
adoption of Christianity by the first historically documented Polish ruler Mieszko I.
County of Portugal becomes independent from the Kingdom of León after the Battle of Ourique as part of the Reconquista. Recognized by León in 1143 and by the Pope in 1179.
Autonomous Principality of Romania founded; becomes kingdom in 1866 and achieved indepdence 1878 Ottoman Empire
Independence of Serbian Principality from the Byzantine Empire.
Dissolution of Czechoslovakia, creating Slovakia and Czech Republic

Dinastical unification of the Crown of Castile and the Crown of Aragon by the Catholic Monarchs. The governments, institutions, and legal traditions of each kingdom remained independent of each other to the present day; alien laws(Leyes de extranjeria) determined that the national of one kingdom was a foreigner in the other Crowns/States.[44]
Eric the Victorious, the first king of Sweden about whom anything definite is known, becomes king.
Independence of Ukrainian People's Republic from Russian Republic declared.

column2: Hong Kong is transferred to the People's Republic of China

column3: Ratification of the Lateran Treaty, making the Vatican City a sovereign State
